title: Atmospheric Bundle Vol.2
description: Don't miss out on this incredible deal! Get your hands on 48 tracks worth of premium game music assets today.
longDescription:
The "Atmospheric Bundle Vol.2" is a collection of the latest and most diverse video game sample libraries, bringing together the moods of Apocalypse, Alien, Transcendent, and Cyberpunk into one comprehensive bundle. This bundle is perfect for game developers who are looking to add a unique and immersive audio experience to their games.

The Apocalypse Atmospheric samples in this bundle capture the essence of a world in ruins, where chaos and destruction reign. The Alien Atmospheric samples take you on a journey through the unknown, where strange and mysterious creatures and technologies await. The Transcendent Atmospheric samples evoke a sense of awe and wonder, perfect for games set in a world beyond our own. The Cyberpunk Atmospheric samples bring you to a neon-lit city of the future, where technology and humanity collide. The samples in this bundle are of the highest quality, recorded and processed with the latest sound engineering techniques, ensuring that they sound stunning and professional. With a variety of sounds available, from the haunting whispers of mysterious entities to the sounds of high-tech machinery and futuristic weaponry, you're sure to find exactly what you need to enhance the audio experience of your video game. Whether you're creating a video game set in a post-apocalyptic world, a journey through the stars, a transcendent realm, or a neon-lit future, the "Atmospheric Bundle Vol.2" has everything you need to bring your game to life.


Get this comprehensive video game sample bundle today and start creating a truly immersive and atmospheric soundscape for your players!



Pack included:


  1. Cyberpunk - View in Marketplace / Listen to HERE
  2. Transcendent - View in Marketplace / Listen to HERE
  3. Alien - View in Marketplace / Listen to HERE
  4. Apocalypse - View in Marketplace / Listen to HERE
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 48

Number of Audio Cues: 48

Bpm: 120.00

Does music\audio loop: Yes

Intended Platforms: All
